data.title: 40 Famous Astrophysicists Birthday, Biography & Family
data.meta_description: List of top 40 popular astrophysicists. Check their biography and facts about their life. Details about birthday, children, spouse, family, awards and life achievements.
data.text:
Andrew E. Lange

Andrew E. Lange was born on 23 July 1957. He was American national and known as Astrophysicist.

Born: 23 July 1957 American
